DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current study check physiological improvement SWT liver skin also antioxidation healthy adult .
DOC.brief_title: Study Antiaging Effect Chinese Herb Drink
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Si-Wu-Tang ( SWT ) well-known traditional Chinese medicine ( TCM ) widely use treat various gynecological disorder . The purpose current study check physiological improvement SWT liver skin also antioxidation healthy adult . Methods : Sixty healthy voluntary subject recruit assign two group , drink 125 mL placebo ( n=30 ) SWT ( n=30 ) 6 continuous day per month follow 6 month vice versa one month washout period . During initial , 3rd , 6th , 10th , 13th month anthropometric measurement perform well fast blood sample draw various biochemical assay . Abdominal ultrasonic skin examination perform initial , 6th 13th month .
DOC.criteria: healthy adult exclusion criterion history smoking , alcoholism pregnant lactate woman , chronic disease , hepatic renal dysfunction .
